tr.th: Initial Case Report Trigger Code Problem Observation

text.paragraph:
Patient presents for 1st prenatal visit after serum pregnancy test confirmation at her PCP.
Last menstrual period was 8 weeks ago.
Reports some nausea, but attributes to "morning sickness"
